title: and 3(b) of section 37B of the National Oil Reserves Agency Act 2007, as
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the National Oil Reserves Agency Act 2007
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the National Oil Reserves Agency Act 2007 

(Delegation of Climate Action Fund Grant Payment Functions) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited national oil reserve agency act 2007 (delegation climate action fund grant payment functions) order 2025

title: and 3(b) of section 37B of the National Oil Reserves Agency Act 2007, as
heading: In this Order—
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order— 

‘Act of 2007’ means the National Oil Reserves Agency Act 2007 (No. 7 of 
2007); 

‘Statutory Instrument’ means the S.I. No. 449/2022 - National Oil Reserves 
Agency Act 2007 (Delegation of Climate Action Fund Grant Payment 
Functions) Order 2022
text_norm: 2 order-- act 2007 mean national oil reserve agency act 2007 (no 7 2007) statutory instrument mean s.i no 449 2022 - national oil reserve agency act 2007 (delegation climate action fund grant payment functions) order 2022

title: and 3(b) of section 37B of the National Oil Reserves Agency Act 2007, as
heading: 3. Section 2 of the Statutory Instrument is amended—
text_raw:
3. Section 2 of the Statutory Instrument is amended— 

(a) 

by removing the following wording from the definition of 
“Community Climate Action Supports”: 

“through education, capacity building and learning” 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

18 June, 2025. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 4th July, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [287] 3
text_norm: 3 section 2 statutory instrument amended-- (a) removing following wording definition community climate action support education capacity building learning given official seal 18 june 2025 darragh brien minister environment climate communication notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 4th july 2025 287 3

title: and 3(b) of section 37B of the National Oil Reserves Agency Act 2007, as
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The purpose of this Order is to delegate to Pobal certain functions related to the 
management of the Community Climate Action Supports within the Climate 
Action Fund. 

 
 
 
 
 4 [287]
